page.title: 06MY DAY
page.content: It is about seven in the morning.I have just woken up.I get out and have a hot wash.I then get dressed and go downstairs."Hi Mum."My dad has already gone to work.I sit down and make some Rice Krispies.I also have a cup of tea.After breakfast I go to school. When the whistle goes we all walk in.We go to assembly at 5 past 9.After that our first lesson begins I expect it's maths.After play we have English.Then at 12:00 we have our dinner then outside to play.Doesn't time fly when you're having fun!! The whistle goes.I bet we have topic work next.After play we might have art then we walk home."Hello Mum! I'm hungry can I have a biscuit?"Then I go and change my clothes.My Dad comes home "Hello Dad!"After tea we settle down for the night.I go to bed at 9:00pm. By Jason Barrow
